title: The Past, Present and Future of Jews in America
description: Gal Beckerman discusses several new books about the state of Judaism in this country, and Kiese Laymon talks about his new memoir, “Heavy.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
content:encoded: Gal Beckerman discusses several new books about the state of Judaism in this country, and Kiese Laymon talks about his new memoir, “Heavy.”
